I've designed for web, desktop, mobile, and more.

Project

01

Tracer Ensemble

Interaction Design  //  Visual Design  //  User Research

Tracer Ensemble is a web application used to remotely manage the HVAC equipment in buildings. I worked as a UX Designer on the Ensemble Building Management team. I was responsible for creating wireframes to conceptualize feature ideas, creating interactive prototypes to show to customers, and creating the final visual designs.

Project

01

Tracer Ensemble

Interaction Design  //  Visual Design  //  User Research

Tracer Ensemble is a web application used to remotely manage the HVAC equipment in buildings. I worked as a UX Designer on the Ensemble Building Management team. I was responsible for creating wireframes to conceptualize feature ideas, creating interactive prototypes to show to customers, and creating the final visual designs.

Project

02

Trace 3D Plus

Interaction Design  //  Front-End Development

Trace 3D Plus is a desktop application used to perform energy analysis on buildings. I worked as a UI Developer on the Trace 3D Plus team before transitioning to focus on UX. I was responsible for executing the stories in any given sprint, which ranged from fixing bugs to implementing user stories.

Read about how I designed & built a feature to perform basic solar shading analysis in Trace 3D Plus
